        public DisplayOption.Builder<T> imageAnimator(ImageAnimator<T> animator)

        返回:

      • imageQuality

        public DisplayOption.Builder<T> imageQuality(ImageQuality quality)
        Set the image quality displaying, lower image quality has a better performance.

        返回:
        Instance of this builder.

      • viewMaybeReused

        public DisplayOption.Builder<T> viewMaybeReused()
        Indicate that the view may be reused, the image won't be set if there is a new request for the same view.
        返回:
        Instance of this builder.
